mapper.select: select r.rv_no, m.m_no ,r.rv_tag ,r.rv_title, TO_CHAR(rv_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as rv_date ,r.rv_cnt,m.m_name,rv_content,rv_image FROM rv_board r inner join member m on r.m_no=m.m_no WHERE rv_no = #{rv_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rv_board(rv_no,m_no ,rv_tag, rv_title, rv_content,rv_image) VALUES (rv_board_seq.nextval, #{m_no},#{rv_tag},#{rv_title},#{rv_content},#{rv_image})
mapper.update: update rv_board set rv_cnt =rv_cnt +1 where rv_no=#{rv_no}
